description: landscape with shadowed tree in black pigment on left; tangled branches also in black pigment in bottom of image and on right side of image; yellow sky with red streaks; green cultivated fields in center with rising hills in murky green pigment at top
inscription: on back, in LRC in pencil: 08.501
markings: LLC red artist\'s seal: 坂本勇 {Sakamoto Isamu}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Pastoral landscape at dusk
